# Idea

1. Settings
    1. Code
        1. File Encoding: `Editor/Code Style/File Encoding: UTF-8`
        2. Line Separator: `Editor/Code Style/General/Line separator: \n`
    2. Shortcuts
        1. `Ctrl + click`: jump to definition
        2. `Ctrl + Shift + N`: open file
    3. Imports: `Code Style.java.Imports`
        1. `Class count to use import with '*': 500`
        2. `Names count to use static import with '*': 500`
    4. Project
        1. Scala
            1. download scala plugin
            2. may need `Add Framework Support for scala` when not see `Scala Class` creating scala class file, just right click project folder
